char* compass_args::etc_data

Misc.

override file

int compass_args::tspd4_print4_flag

This is a mild hack, it =1 if in adult model travel time calibration mode (use -t command line option).

It causes output at 4 timesteps per day (if using 4 timesteps per day). Otherwise, output is coerced to 2 timesteps per day to accomodate the adult-realtime program's expectations.
